column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday November 19 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd / Man O War Blvd:
column4: Injury collision involving an overturned pickup and 30 ft trailer carrying two other pickups.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd / Man O War Blvd:
column4: All outbound/southbound lanes of Nicholasville Rd are shutdown with traffic diverted to Man O War Blvd.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd / Man O War Blvd:
column4: All traffic on the outer loop of Man O War Blvd is being diverted to Nichols Park Dr.
Enterprise Dr is completely shutdown due to reports of a sulphur dioxide leak.  Multiple Fire units are on scene.

column3: I-75/I-71 at Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: Details, detours, and updates from the KY Transportation Cabinet.
